tool_description: Evaluates emergency evacuation routes and procedures for accessibility, ensuring safe egress for people with disabilities during emergencies.

exit_routes.description: Exit route identifiers or descriptions to analyze

emergency_systems.description: Emergency systems present: fire_alarm, strobe_lights, voice_evacuation, areas_of_rescue, emergency_lighting

mobility_aid_users.description: Estimated number of wheelchair and mobility device users

evacuation_drills.description: Whether accessibility-inclusive evacuation drills are conducted

floor_levels.description: Floor levels to analyze for egress accessibility

error_messages: Invalid building ID: Provide a valid building identifier from the assessment system.
Occupancy load out of range: Specify a realistic occupancy number greater than 0.
Insufficient exit routes: At least one exit route must be specified for analysis.
Unrecognized emergency system: Use only specified emergency system types.
Invalid mobility aid count: Number must be non-negative and reasonable for building size.
Floor level error: Ensure floor numbers are within the building's actual floor range.
usage: Provide building details, occupancy information, and exit routes to analyze. Include emergency systems and estimated users requiring accessible egress for comprehensive evaluation.

egress_analysis_id.description: Unique identifier for this egress accessibility analysis

accessible_exits.description: Number of exits that meet accessibility requirements

egress_deficiencies.description: List of identified problems with accessible emergency egress

rescue_area_adequacy.description: Assessment of areas of rescue assistance: adequate, insufficient, missing

alarm_accessibility.description: Evaluation of emergency alarm accessibility for deaf/hard of hearing individuals
